name: Jelly Bun
description:
Made in around one month to learn GBstudio you play as a little jelly bean bun hunting down a tasty snack of beans in this cute but challenging classic style platformer.

Try to get a 3-star rank on both demo zones, look hard enough and you might find a hidden gem to make it easier!

Try the demo out on your Analogue pocket or on a real DMG gameboy with a compatible flash cart!
